name: dialectally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to a dialect (= a form of language that people speak in a particular part of a country): It's a complex city dialectally. We need to consider languages that are dialectally very diverse in contrast to more homogeneous languages.
More examplesFewer examplesHow do the American versions of the books differ dialectally from the British ones?The form was dialectally restricted and rarely used in written language.The dialectally divergent spellings suggest that at least three written English versions of the tale existed.
